entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast.
